content: WhorekiNetwork is the troll ,a malicious, mysogynistic and racist person.Who wants to harm a project because he lost money with a poorly managed old project.A malicious, mysogynistic and racist person.Who wants to harm a project because he lost money with a poorly managed old project. This person has set up a systematic denigration campaign for the project that I support on various social networks.

comments.author: netluxe
comments.body: This has to be some kind of joke, right?Not only is your "project" Github page full of stuff that's all forked from other, actually legitimate projects, you didn't even bother putting in the minimum amount of effort to make it look as if you are actively developing any of the stuff you forked.  Couldn't be bothered to change the default readme.md files, for example, or do more than 1 commit to any of the repos on your page in the last 3+ weeks.I won't even begin to go into any of the other ridiculous aspects of this, it's a waste of my time.  How many threads like this have you started on your alt accounts here, btw?  I've seen more than a few and I don't even come here that often anymore.

comments.author: WhorekiNetwork
comments.created_time: November 28, 2023, 06:18:13 AMLast edit: November 28, 2023, 07:40:43 AM by WhorekiNetwork
comments.body: It's a 100% scam. Don't waste your time and assets on it.Gorki Network forked RChain's source code and initiated its promotion as a new blockchain, a claim that lacks veracity.https://i.postimg.cc/Xv2tQWFD/image.pngThe code has been in development since January 2017, funded entirely by RChain members and REV token holders. RChain, a US-based cooperative dedicated to developing a cryptocurrency smart contract platform, faced insolvency due to mismanagement before and during Ting Yang's presidency.In this challenging period, Ting Yang assured stakeholders that the project would endure beyond the cooperative's dissolution. She specifically pledged to safeguard the value of the crypto tokens (REV) designated for sponsoring RChain's source code development. https://youtube.com/watch?v=qe3azJWvnLghttps://i.postimg.cc/c1wjK2TY/Screenshot-from-2023-11-27-18-44-01.pngHowever, she undertook another project named Rhonix, registered an offshore company in Dubai (Rhonix Labs FZE) to evade liability, and failed to honor her commitments to REV holders and RChain members. This decision was made discreetly, behind closed doors, with only selected members and the development team being privy to the information. Notably, these individuals also secured RNXT tokens, the precursors to Gorki. Unfortunately, some individuals were deceived into losing their newly acquired RNXT tokens. Complaints and reports were submitted to the police by scam victims.https://i.postimg.cc/X7YWKsTJ/Screenshot-from-2023-11-28-05-21-05.pngAdditionally, Ting Yang's associates began banning cooperative contributing members from official RChain Telegram channels, further fueling outrage.https://i.postimg.cc/w3YgkzJs/tunkas-troll.pngRhonix Labs' Twitter account was suspended for violating Twitter/X rules.https://i.postimg.cc/P5g6SqFx/Screenshot-from-2023-11-28-05-00-02.pngAll of this led to a strong reaction from RChain members, culminating in the rebranding of Rhonix as Gorki Network. Outraged members established a Twitter account (@whorenixtrollop) to voice their concerns.Furthermore, Ting Yang took measures to conceal her face, signature, and the name of the offshore company from the project's website. Her involvement can still be proved by her linkedin profile.https://i.postimg.cc/c1wjK2TY/Screenshot-from-2023-11-27-18-44-01.pngI could go on talking about this for a long time.

comments.author: WhorekiNetwork
comments.created_time: November 29, 2023, 05:27:27 AMLast edit: November 29, 2023, 08:16:48 PM by WhorekiNetwork
comments.body: Quote from: ikky_69 on November 28, 2023, 08:43:23 PMQuote It's a 100% scam. Don't waste your time and assets on it.Ridiculous 100% troll especially  Your message is ridiculous and counterproductive, one of the only chances that your REV token will regain value is to be reborn on a fragment of the Gorky network. I will not dwell on your racist and mysogynistic proposals on telegram against our CEO. If this post is not deleted tomorrow I will demonstrate your bad faith point by point.People violently dislike your project and its CEO as a consequence of many of the reasons I stated. Your reply sounds like an ultimatum and a threat. It doesn't sound like you are demonstrating good faith.
